Q25. Summary Table: To what extent do you agree or disagree, if at all, with the following statements about what life is like for young people, aged 16-24, in your local community?
Young people in my community have access to educational and employment opportunities
There are free activities for young people in my community to do
Young people in my community have safe places to meet socially
There is good support for young people struggling with mental health in my community
Young people in my community are able to influence decision making
The voices of young people in my community are listened to
I would like to be a young person in the UK today
Young people in my community can easily find affordable housing
